ja423:1.4: jīvantova visussati → jīvantopi visussati (sya1ed, sya2ed); jīvareva visussati (pts-vp-pli1); jīvanto vāpi sussati (mr)
ja423:2.3: Sosi → sopi (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1, mr) | sukhā → sukha (sya1ed, sya2ed); sukhaṃ (mr)
ja423:5.1: gahapatī → gahapatiṃ (bj); gahapataṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1); gahavataṃ (?)
ja423:6.2: api so → asito (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1) | devilo → devalo (bj, pts-vp-pli1)
